arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّخِذُونَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ أَيَبْتَغُونَ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْعِزَّةَ فَإِنَّ ٱلْعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	leave	the	Muslims	to	befriend	
the	 disbelievers;	 do	 they	 seek	 honour	
from	them?	Then	(know	that)	undoubtedly all	honour	is	for	Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Musalmanoñ	ko	chord	kar	kāfiroñ	ko	dost	banāte	haiñ	kya	un	ke	pās	izzat	dhooñdhte	
haiñ	to	izzat	to	sāri	Allah	ke	liye	hai.

arabicText: وَقَدْ نَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنْ إِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يُكْفَرُ بِهَا وَيُسْتَهْزَأُ بِهَا فَلَا تَقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُوا۟ فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيْرِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًۭا مِّثْلُهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ جَامِعُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ جَمِيعًا
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	Allah has	sent	down	to	you	in	the	Book	that	whenever	you	hear	the	signs	of	Allah
being	 rejected	 or	 being	made	 fun	 of,	 do	 not	 sit	with	 those	 people,	 until	 they	 engage	in	 some	
other	conversation;	or	else	you	too	are	like them;	undoubtedly	Allah will	gather	the	hypocrites	
and	the	disbelievers,	all	together,	into	hell
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	beshak	Allah	 tum	par	Kitāb	meiñ	utār	chuka	ke	jab	 tum	Allah	ki	āyatoñ	ko	suno	ke	unka	
inkār	kiya	jāta	aur	unki	hañsi	banāyi	jāti	hai	to	un	logoñ	ke	sāth	na	baitho	jab	tak	woh	aur	bāt	
meiñ	mashghool	na	hoñ	warna	tum	bhi	unke	jaise	ho	beshak	Allah	munāfiqoñ	aur	kāfiroñ	sab	
ko	jahannam	meiñ	ikhat-tha	kareg

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَرَبَّصُونَ بِكُمْ فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ فَتْحٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ وَإِن كَانَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ نَصِيبٌۭ قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ نَسْتَحْوِذْ عَلَيْكُمْ وَنَمْنَعْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ وَلَن يَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ سَبِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 keep	 watching	 your	
circumstances;	 so	 if	 a	 victory	 comes	 to	
you	 from	 Allah,	 they	 say,	 “Were	 we	 not	
with	 you?”;	 and	 if	 victory	 is	 for	
disbelievers,	 they	 say,	 “Did	 we	 not	 have	
control	 over	 you,	 and	 protect	 you	 from	
the	 Muslims?”	 Allah will	 judge	 between	
you	 all	 on	 the	 Day	 of	 Resurrection;	 and	
Allah will	not	provide	the	disbelievers	any	
way	over	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	 tumhāri	 hālat	 takā	 (Dekha)	 karte	
haiñ	to	agar	Allah	ki	taraf	se	tum	ko	fatāh	
mile	kaheñ	kya	ham	tumhāre	sāth	na	they	
aur	agar	kāfiroñ	ka	hissa	ho	to	unse	kaheñ	
kya	hameiñ	tum	par	qābu	na	tha	aur	ham	
ne	 tumheiñ	 Musalmānoñ	 se	 bachāya	 to	
Allah	tum	sab	meiñ	Qayāmat	ke	din	faislā	
kardega	aur	Allah	kāfiroñ	ko	Musalmanoñ	
par	koi	rāh	na	dega	.

arabicText: مُّذَبْذَبِينَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ لَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَلَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. Undoubtedly	 the	 hypocrites,	 in	 their	
fancy,	 seek	 to	 deceive	 Allah whereas	 He	
will	 extinguish	 them	 while	 making	 them	
oblivious;	 and	 when	 they	 stand	 up	 for	
prayer,	 they	 do	 it	 unwillingly	 and	 for	
others	 to	see,	and	 they	do	not	 remember	
Allah except	a	little.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 munāfiq	 log	 apne	 gumān	 meiñ	
Allah	 ko	 fareb	 diya	 chāhte	 haiñ	aur	wohi	
unheiñ ghāfil	 karke	 mārega	 aur	 jab	
Namāz	ko	khade	hoñ	to	hāre	ji	se	logoñ	ko	
dikhāwa	karte	haiñ	aur	Allah	ko	yād	nahi	
karte	magar	thoda.	.

arabicText: مُّذَبْذَبِينَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ لَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَلَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Fluctuating	in	the	middle;	neither	here	(in	
faith)	nor	 there	(in	disbelief);	and	 for	one	
whom	 Allah sends	 astray,	 you	 will	 not	
find	a	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beech	 meiñ	 dagmaga	 rahe	 haiñ	 na	 idhar	
ke	na	udhar	ke	aur	jise	Allah	gumrāh	kare	
to	uske	liye	koi	rāh	na	pāye	ga.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ أَتُرِيدُونَ أَن تَجْعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا مُّبِينًا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 befriend	
disbelievers	 in	 place	 of	 Muslims;	 do	 you	
wish	 to give	 Allah a	 clear	 proof	 against	
you?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Kāfiroñ	ko	dost	na	banāo	
Musalmanoñ	 ke	 siwa	 kya	 yeh	 chāhte	 ho	
ke	 apne	 upar	 Allah	 ke	 liye	 sareeh	 hujjat	
kar	lo

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ فِى ٱلدَّرْكِ ٱلْأَسْفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمْ نَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	 the	 hypocrites	 are	 in	 the	
deepest	 segment	 of	 hell;	 and	 you	 will	
never	find	any	supporter	for	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Beshak	munāfiq	dozakh	ke	sabse	neeche	tabqe	meiñ	haiñ	hargiz	unka	koi	madad-gār	na	pāye	ga

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ وَٱعْتَصَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَأَخْلَصُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لِلَّهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَعَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَسَوْفَ يُؤْتِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Except	 those	who	 repented	and	 reformed	 themselves	and	 held	 fast	 to	Allah’s	 rope	and	made	
their	religion	sincerely	only	for	Allah - so	they	are	with	the	Muslims;	and	Allah will	soon	bestow	
upon	the	believers	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	woh	jinhoñ	ne	tauba	ki	aur	sañwre	(Apni	Islāh ki	)	aur	Allah	ki	Rassi	mazboot	thāmi	aur	
apna	Deen	 khālis	 Allah	 ke	liye	 kar	liyā	 to	 yeh Musalmanoñ	 ke	 sāth	 haiñ	 aur	 an-qareeb	 Allah	
Musalmanoñ	ko	badā	sawāb	dega.

arabicText: مَّا يَفْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمْ إِن شَكَرْتُمْ وَءَامَنتُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
. And	what	will	Allah gain	by	punishing	you,	if	you	acknowledge	the	truth	and	accept	faith?	And	
Allah is	Most	Appreciative,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	Allah	tumheiñ	ázāb	dekar	kiya	karega	agar	tum	Haq	māno	aur	 Imān	lāo	aur	Allah	hai	silā	
dene	wāla	jān	ne	wāla
